title: Twitter-like Social Media App
description: A full-featured social media platform with real-time updates, user authentication, post creation, likes, comments, and direct messaging using WebSocket technology.

title: HR Onboarding Platform
description: Internal enterprise application for Pilot Corporation to streamline employee onboarding process. Features automated PDF generation, email workflows, and document management.

title: E-commerce Dropshipping Platform
description: Shopify-based dropshipping store with advanced SEO optimization, custom theme development, UX/UI improvements, and automated inventory management.
